puppies.name: Samuel
puppies.personalityTraits: Samuel is a calm and well-behaved pup. He gets along great with children and is very friendly.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Samuel is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Returned once already by the first adopter. Loves water and enjoys swimming in the lake.

puppies.name: Tilly
puppies.personalityTraits: Tillie is a loving and playful pup. She adores affection and enjoys playing with her toys.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Tillie is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Has a tendency to chase squirrels in the backyard.

puppies.name: Barnaby
puppies.personalityTraits: Barnaby is full of energy and loves to stay active. He has a big appetite and is always ready to play.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Barnaby has not received vaccinations yet.
puppies.specialNeeds: Barnaby requires a special diet due to food allergies.
puppies.notes: Enjoys car rides and is well-behaved during trips.

puppies.name: Emily
puppies.personalityTraits: Emily is a friendly and sociable pup. She gets along well with other dogs and is great around people.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Emily has not received vaccinations yet.
puppies.notes: A bit shy at first but becomes very affectionate with time.

puppies.name: Buddy
puppies.personalityTraits: Buddy is a playful and loyal companion. He loves to play fetch and is great with kids.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Buddy is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.specialNeeds: Buddy has hip dysplasia and requires special care.
puppies.notes: Requires a daily exercise routine to stay happy and healthy.

puppies.name: Luna
puppies.personalityTraits: Luna is a tiny bundle of energy. She's very affectionate and loves cuddling.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Luna is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Excellent watchdog and barks at unfamiliar sounds.

puppies.name: Max
puppies.personalityTraits: Max is a playful and protective pup. He loves to play fetch and will keep a watchful eye on his family.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Max is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Has a favorite toy, a squeaky ball they carry everywhere.

puppies.name: Milo
puppies.personalityTraits: Milo is a gentle giant with a friendly disposition. Despite his size, he's very gentle and good with kids.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Milo has not received vaccinations yet.
puppies.specialNeeds: Milo has a heart condition and requires daily medication.
puppies.notes: Loves belly rubs and will roll over for them.

puppies.name: Daisy
puppies.personalityTraits: Daisy is a playful and curious pup. She loves exploring and is always up for a game of fetch.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Daisy is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Enjoys sunbathing in the garden on warm days.

puppies.name: Charlie
puppies.personalityTraits: Charlie is a friendly pup who absolutely loves food. He's a great companion for anyone who enjoys sharing treats.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Charlie is up-to-date on all vaccinations.
puppies.notes: Has a unique tricolor coat pattern that makes them stand out.

puppies.name: Ruby
puppies.personalityTraits: Ruby is a highly energetic and loyal pup. She loves going on long walks and is fiercely loyal to her family.
puppies.vaccinationRecords: Ruby has not received vaccinations yet.
puppies.notes: Known for their impressive agility and is a natural at playing fetch in the park.
